array:
Welcome to my landing page where I link to the various creative
  and technical work I've done, which doubles as a directory showcasing websites
  I've made.

New Genesis Artform is a website I made to showcase my artistic writings, videos, and music
  guided by common themes of technological transhumanism.
Scream In To Void is a brand under which I released a computer game, The Den of Worms.

Synesthesia is a website which hosts several videos I made experimenting with
  live processed audio reactive visuals.
My resume coded into html if you would like to hire me for some sort of project.
